title: Very good
data: Inspired from the white djerbian Menzels, the hotel, is located on a plot of 11 hectares planted with olive and palm trees along the beautiful sandy beach of Djerba. The Manager assisted by his staff will give you a warm welcome Here everything is done to make you enjoy your stay in this comfortable hotel with its sandy beach, large outdoor freshwater swimming pool and heated indoor pool withan outdoor pool set in the patio. The Golf Beach has 237 fully air conditioned rooms. All rooms are equipped with bathroom (bath or shower), TV, telephone, safe, mini-bar, Wi-Fi and terrace with sea view (with extra charge), pool view or garden view according to their orientation. The Golf Beach also has 14 villas fully air-conditioned, each consisting of 3 bedrooms with bathroom, living room with a dining area, TV, Wi-Fi,a terrace and an equipped kitchen. Meals are served in the main restaurant OLIVERAIE, which opens onto the gardens and pool and declines as tasty and varied buffets for every gourmet delights, international and traditional cuisine. The hotel also offers two themed restaurants Le Pêcheur and La Felouque (Tunisian specialty) and a snack right on the beach. For those who wish to spend and live sports holidays, the Golf Beach offers a wide range of activities including windsurfing, tennis, mini golf, table tennis, gym, horse riding ... Possibility to play golf (27 holes) at about 10 km. For your conferences, seminars and meetings, the Golf Beach offers a large room for 250 people, and three subcommittee rooms.

title: Excellent
data: Renovated in 2014, the lti Djerba Plaza Thalasso & Spa is located inside a palm park of 14 hectares next to a turquoise blue sea and sandy beach in the heart of the touristic area of Midoun. The Djerba Plaza reflects the magic of the island and offers all full modern comfort and a sense of well-being to its guests. The rooms entirely renovated are located in Menzels that enclose planted Djerbian Patios. Each Patio is surrounded by 24 rooms and suites on each floor overlooking either the sea or a very rich palm park and the Djerba Golf course. The Thalasso & spa offers a subtle gastronomic palette, a sunny and flavorsome cuisine that combines pleasure and health. A wide variety of outdoor and indoor sports & leisure activities are available at the lti Djerba Plaza Thalasso & SPa. The Thalasso & Spa is a response to the ills of the modern world : fatigue, stress, depression, back pain, overweight, sleep... Prepare to be pampered in our state of the art thalassotherapy center offering a full variety of wellness treatments and cares. The beneficial effects of the thalassotherapy will be presented you through our different spaces. Our skilled therapists employ natural healing agents to create enriching thalasso treatments tailored to our guests’ specific health, wellness and beauty needs. A vacation for your body, a holiday for your soul ! Incentives & Congress: Space can accommodate from 15 to 400 people with audiovisual equipment, and is available to our clients to organize cultural events, seminars, conferences, or any other type of gathering.

data: With its traditional, elegant architecture on the outside and modern facilities on the inside, SunConnect Djerba Aqua Resort is a charming hotel for the entire family. title: Very good

title: Very good
data: Le Jerba Sun club est un hôtel entièrement rénové en complète harmonie avec son environnement. Il offre un mariage exceptionnel entre les commodités d’un hôtel moderne et une décoration d’inspiration berbère et djerbienne. Le complexe s’étend sur une superficie de 98,000 mètres carrés, un petit village pittoresque avec de beaux jardins fleuris et colorés de toutes les couleurs et des arbres magnifiques. Le club offre une vaste variété d’ activités sportives ainsi que celles pour la relaxation du corps et de l’esprit. 4 grands bâtiments de 385 chambres dont des chambres familiales, quadruples, communicantes et supérieures. Dans notre club, l’animation, quasi-permanente tout le long de la journée et pendant une grande partie de la nuit, est assurée par une grande équipe avec de nombreuses spécialités. Un grand spectacle est programmé chaque soir, précédé par le mini disco. Jerba Sun Club vous propose un « CENTRE SPA » avec une variété de choix

title: Very good
data: Decorated in a traditional Djerbian style, the Seabel Aladin Djerba is a wonderful holiday destination both inside and out. Sunseekers can lie back and work on their tan by the pool or on the sandy private beach, while a wide range of games and activities will keep the more active well-occupied. If it all gets too much, you can slip into the on-site spa for a treatment, or lounge around the 2-story pool. On the south coast of the island of Djerba, on the edge of a fire sand beach, Djerba Seabel Aladin is built with a local architecture style in the middle of our wonderful flowered park of 6 hectares.

title: Excellent
data: The Hotel Sidi Mansour Resort & Spa is located in the heart of the tourist area of the island of Djerba, 250 m from a beach of fine white sand and in front of the lighthouse Taguermes, one of the highest in North Africa. The hotel is located 25 minutes from the international airport of Djerba and 15 from Houmt Souk (capital of the island). It is also just 6 km from Midoun, the second largest city of the island, and 5 km from a golf course with 27 holes.

title: Excellent
data:
The Iberostar Mehari Djerba hotel is undoubtedly the perfect landing point for guests who seek a special trip in one of the most magical places in Tunisia. Located on the seductive beach of Sidi Akkour, Djerba, is a hotel built in traditional Tunisian style where you can stay in double rooms or family rooms that have been refurbished to provide a cosier ambiance and some of the best services for rest and relaxation.
In the Monkey Club, children have a space to do all kinds of activities, games and sports that they will love and enjoy in the company of instructors and other playmates. Meanwhile, adults have a range of services including the body treatments and facilities of the SPA Sensations, the fitness room, free Wi-Fi, water sports, outdoor pools with a solarium, amazing shows, live music...And of course the flavours of the delicious Tunisian and international cuisine served at its two restaurants and four bars.

title: Excellent
data: SENTIDO Djerba Beach is the perfect hotel for the whole family. This hotel has a very tranquil location with quiet surroundings, and is located directly on the sandy beach. If you want an extra peaceful and recovering stay, you can enjoy a relaxing trip to the hotel's own Turkish bath or enjoy a soothing massage at the spa. For the more active family, the hotel organizes a wide range of activities, and there are two tennis courts at the hotel. Or why not discover the surroundings horseback, or rent a bike to discover the island of Djerba by yourself? In short, at SENTIDO Djerba Beach, there is something for the entire family.

title: Excellent
data: The Cesar Thalasso is an adults only hotel and bookable for guest from 16+. The hotel is located at the Plage de Sidi Mahrez beach on Djerba and is an favorite holiday destination. Midoun is on of the biggest cities on Djerba and is just 6 km away from the Cesar Thalasso. Here you can find many cafes, restaurants shopping facilities and clubs. The area is famous for its authentic markets where a huge of variety will be offered. Moreover, you can find many different spices and souvenirs. The capital of Djerba is Houmt Souk and is 15 km away from the Cesar Thalasso. The international airport of Djerba is 25 km away. All meals are available at the buffet of the main restaurant in the Cesar Thalasso. You can also choose the A la Carte-Restaurant of the Cesar Thalasso. You can enjoy a drink in the Bar. The Cesar Thalasso has got four tennis courts. Moreover, there are many activity offers from locals at the beach.

title: Very good

title: Very good

title: Very good
data: Le Jerba Sun club est un hôtel entièrement rénové en complète harmonie avec son environnement. Il offre un mariage exceptionnel entre les commodités d’un hôtel moderne et une décoration d’inspiration berbère et djerbienne. Le complexe s’étend sur une superficie de 98,000 mètres carrés, un petit village pittoresque avec de beaux jardins fleuris et colorés de toutes les couleurs et des arbres magnifiques. Le club offre une vaste variété d’ activités sportives ainsi que celles pour la relaxation du corps et de l’esprit. 4 grands bâtiments de 385 chambres dont des chambres familiales, quadruples, communicantes et supérieures. Dans notre club, l’animation, quasi-permanente tout le long de la journée et pendant une grande partie de la nuit, est assurée par une grande équipe avec de nombreuses spécialités. Un grand spectacle est programmé chaque soir, précédé par le mini disco. Jerba Sun Club vous propose un « CENTRE SPA » avec une variété de choix

title: Excellent
data:
The Iberostar Mehari Djerba hotel is undoubtedly the perfect landing point for guests who seek a special trip in one of the most magical places in Tunisia. Located on the seductive beach of Sidi Akkour, Djerba, is a hotel built in traditional Tunisian style where you can stay in double rooms or family rooms that have been refurbished to provide a cosier ambiance and some of the best services for rest and relaxation.
In the Monkey Club, children have a space to do all kinds of activities, games and sports that they will love and enjoy in the company of instructors and other playmates. Meanwhile, adults have a range of services including the body treatments and facilities of the SPA Sensations, the fitness room, free Wi-Fi, water sports, outdoor pools with a solarium, amazing shows, live music...And of course the flavours of the delicious Tunisian and international cuisine served at its two restaurants and four bars.

title: Excellent
data: SENTIDO Djerba Beach is the perfect hotel for the whole family. This hotel has a very tranquil location with quiet surroundings, and is located directly on the sandy beach. If you want an extra peaceful and recovering stay, you can enjoy a relaxing trip to the hotel's own Turkish bath or enjoy a soothing massage at the spa. For the more active family, the hotel organizes a wide range of activities, and there are two tennis courts at the hotel. Or why not discover the surroundings horseback, or rent a bike to discover the island of Djerba by yourself? In short, at SENTIDO Djerba Beach, there is something for the entire family.

title: Excellent
data: The Hotel Sidi Mansour Resort & Spa is located in the heart of the tourist area of the island of Djerba, 250 m from a beach of fine white sand and in front of the lighthouse Taguermes, one of the highest in North Africa. The hotel is located 25 minutes from the international airport of Djerba and 15 from Houmt Souk (capital of the island). It is also just 6 km from Midoun, the second largest city of the island, and 5 km from a golf course with 27 holes.

title: Excellent
data: Renovated in 2014, the lti Djerba Plaza Thalasso & Spa is located inside a palm park of 14 hectares next to a turquoise blue sea and sandy beach in the heart of the touristic area of Midoun. The Djerba Plaza reflects the magic of the island and offers all full modern comfort and a sense of well-being to its guests. The rooms entirely renovated are located in Menzels that enclose planted Djerbian Patios. Each Patio is surrounded by 24 rooms and suites on each floor overlooking either the sea or a very rich palm park and the Djerba Golf course. The Thalasso & spa offers a subtle gastronomic palette, a sunny and flavorsome cuisine that combines pleasure and health. A wide variety of outdoor and indoor sports & leisure activities are available at the lti Djerba Plaza Thalasso & SPa. The Thalasso & Spa is a response to the ills of the modern world : fatigue, stress, depression, back pain, overweight, sleep... Prepare to be pampered in our state of the art thalassotherapy center offering a full variety of wellness treatments and cares. The beneficial effects of the thalassotherapy will be presented you through our different spaces. Our skilled therapists employ natural healing agents to create enriching thalasso treatments tailored to our guests’ specific health, wellness and beauty needs. A vacation for your body, a holiday for your soul ! Incentives & Congress: Space can accommodate from 15 to 400 people with audiovisual equipment, and is available to our clients to organize cultural events, seminars, conferences, or any other type of gathering.

title: Very good
data: Inspired from the white djerbian Menzels, the hotel, is located on a plot of 11 hectares planted with olive and palm trees along the beautiful sandy beach of Djerba. The Manager assisted by his staff will give you a warm welcome Here everything is done to make you enjoy your stay in this comfortable hotel with its sandy beach, large outdoor freshwater swimming pool and heated indoor pool withan outdoor pool set in the patio. The Golf Beach has 237 fully air conditioned rooms. All rooms are equipped with bathroom (bath or shower), TV, telephone, safe, mini-bar, Wi-Fi and terrace with sea view (with extra charge), pool view or garden view according to their orientation. The Golf Beach also has 14 villas fully air-conditioned, each consisting of 3 bedrooms with bathroom, living room with a dining area, TV, Wi-Fi,a terrace and an equipped kitchen. Meals are served in the main restaurant OLIVERAIE, which opens onto the gardens and pool and declines as tasty and varied buffets for every gourmet delights, international and traditional cuisine. The hotel also offers two themed restaurants Le Pêcheur and La Felouque (Tunisian specialty) and a snack right on the beach. For those who wish to spend and live sports holidays, the Golf Beach offers a wide range of activities including windsurfing, tennis, mini golf, table tennis, gym, horse riding ... Possibility to play golf (27 holes) at about 10 km. For your conferences, seminars and meetings, the Golf Beach offers a large room for 250 people, and three subcommittee rooms.

Il offre un mariage exceptionnel entre les commodités d’un hôtel moderne et une décoration d’inspiration berbère et djerbienne. Le complexe s’étend sur une superficie de 98,000 mètres carrés, un petit village pittoresque avec de beaux jardins fleuris et colorés de toutes les couleurs et des arbres magnifiques. Le club offre une vaste variété d’ activités sportives ainsi que celles pour la relaxation du corps et de l’esprit. 4 grands bâtiments de 385 chambres dont des chambres familiales, quadruples, communicantes et supérieures. Dans notre club, l’animation, quasi-permanente tout le long de la journée et pendant une grande partie de la nuit, est assurée par une grande équipe avec de nombreuses spécialités. Un grand spectacle est programmé chaque soir, précédé par le mini disco. Jerba Sun Club vous propose un « CENTRE SPA » avec une variété de choix

title: Very good
data: Caribbean World Thalasso Djerba is located 25 kms away from Djerba airport and at 14 kms from the Island's main town "Houmt Souk".With its highly exotic style, Caribbean World Thalasso Djerba offers a wide range of exciting activities.

title: Very good
data: WELCOME MERIDIANA DJERBA offers an original decoration, a view directly on a paradisiac beach, attentive staff and a very varied restoration. Set in a 10-hectare park, WELCOME MERIDIANA DJERBA offers a wide range of sports and leisure activities, including a large outdoor swimming pool, a football pitch, a mini club and a recently renovated thalassotherapy center. WELCOME MERIDIANA forms a fabulous setting for families, young people, children, couples on honeymoon ...

title: Excellent
data: Enjoy an outstanding seaside resort experience in the northern coast of Djerba island. At the foot of the Taguermess light-house, the Renovated Seabel Rym Beach, is located on the prime white sandy beachfront & set in the heart of an 11-hectare palm grove. It is 6 km from Midoun, 15 km from Houmt Souk, 20 km from the airport and 3 km from the Djerba Golf Course (27 holes).

title: Excellent
data:
The Iberostar Mehari Djerba hotel is undoubtedly the perfect landing point for guests who seek a special trip in one of the most magical places in Tunisia. Located on the seductive beach of Sidi Akkour, Djerba, is a hotel built in traditional Tunisian style where you can stay in double rooms or family rooms that have been refurbished to provide a cosier ambiance and some of the best services for rest and relaxation.
In the Monkey Club, children have a space to do all kinds of activities, games and sports that they will love and enjoy in the company of instructors and other playmates. Meanwhile, adults have a range of services including the body treatments and facilities of the SPA Sensations, the fitness room, free Wi-Fi, water sports, outdoor pools with a solarium, amazing shows, live music...And of course the flavours of the delicious Tunisian and international cuisine served at its two restaurants and four bars.

title: Excellent
data: The deluxe Palm Beach Palace gives you direct access to a white beach, and is getting a 21st-century makeover for May 2015. Picture-perfect views of the horizon are part of the deal at this hotel. It’s pulled up next to a private sliver of pristine white sand. Plus, the bustling markets of Houmt Souk are less than 20 minutes away in a taxi.

title: Very good
data: Welcome to Joya Paradise, your Midoun “home away from home.” Joya Paradise aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.	Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Jama Fadloud (Mosque) (2.3 mi) and Phare de Taguermess (Lighthouse) (3.0 mi), guests of Hotel Joya Paradise can easily experience some of Midoun's most well known attractions.	Joya Paradise is a family-friendly hotel offering a refrigerator and air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free internet access is offered to guests.	The hotel features a concierge. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Midoun. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.	If you are looking for some good spots to eat nearby, you may want to check out Rachid et Sophie (0.3 mi), Les Palmiers Chez Neji et Catherine (0.4 mi), or Chez Chouchou (0.3 mi), all of which are within walking distance of Hotel Joya Paradise.	Should time allow, Krokodilfarm Animalia is a popular park that is relatively easy to get to.	Joya Paradise puts the best of Midoun at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

title: Excellent
data: SENTIDO Djerba Beach is the perfect hotel for the whole family. This hotel has a very tranquil location with quiet surroundings, and is located directly on the sandy beach. If you want an extra peaceful and recovering stay, you can enjoy a relaxing trip to the hotel's own Turkish bath or enjoy a soothing massage at the spa. For the more active family, the hotel organizes a wide range of activities, and there are two tennis courts at the hotel. Or why not discover the surroundings horseback, or rent a bike to discover the island of Djerba by yourself? In short, at SENTIDO Djerba Beach, there is something for the entire family.

title: Excellent
data: The Hotel Sidi Mansour Resort & Spa is located in the heart of the tourist area of the island of Djerba, 250 m from a beach of fine white sand and in front of the lighthouse Taguermes, one of the highest in North Africa. The hotel is located 25 minutes from the international airport of Djerba and 15 from Houmt Souk (capital of the island). It is also just 6 km from Midoun, the second largest city of the island, and 5 km from a golf course with 27 holes.

title: Excellent
data: Renovated in 2014, the lti Djerba Plaza Thalasso & Spa is located inside a palm park of 14 hectares next to a turquoise blue sea and sandy beach in the heart of the touristic area of Midoun. The Djerba Plaza reflects the magic of the island and offers all full modern comfort and a sense of well-being to its guests. The rooms entirely renovated are located in Menzels that enclose planted Djerbian Patios. Each Patio is surrounded by 24 rooms and suites on each floor overlooking either the sea or a very rich palm park and the Djerba Golf course. The Thalasso & spa offers a subtle gastronomic palette, a sunny and flavorsome cuisine that combines pleasure and health. A wide variety of outdoor and indoor sports & leisure activities are available at the lti Djerba Plaza Thalasso & SPa. The Thalasso & Spa is a response to the ills of the modern world : fatigue, stress, depression, back pain, overweight, sleep... Prepare to be pampered in our state of the art thalassotherapy center offering a full variety of wellness treatments and cares. The beneficial effects of the thalassotherapy will be presented you through our different spaces. Our skilled therapists employ natural healing agents to create enriching thalasso treatments tailored to our guests’ specific health, wellness and beauty needs. A vacation for your body, a holiday for your soul ! Incentives & Congress: Space can accommodate from 15 to 400 people with audiovisual equipment, and is available to our clients to organize cultural events, seminars, conferences, or any other type of gathering.

title: Very good
data: Inspired from the white djerbian Menzels, the hotel, is located on a plot of 11 hectares planted with olive and palm trees along the beautiful sandy beach of Djerba. The Manager assisted by his staff will give you a warm welcome Here everything is done to make you enjoy your stay in this comfortable hotel with its sandy beach, large outdoor freshwater swimming pool and heated indoor pool withan outdoor pool set in the patio. The Golf Beach has 237 fully air conditioned rooms. All rooms are equipped with bathroom (bath or shower), TV, telephone, safe, mini-bar, Wi-Fi and terrace with sea view (with extra charge), pool view or garden view according to their orientation. The Golf Beach also has 14 villas fully air-conditioned, each consisting of 3 bedrooms with bathroom, living room with a dining area, TV, Wi-Fi,a terrace and an equipped kitchen. Meals are served in the main restaurant OLIVERAIE, which opens onto the gardens and pool and declines as tasty and varied buffets for every gourmet delights, international and traditional cuisine. The hotel also offers two themed restaurants Le Pêcheur and La Felouque (Tunisian specialty) and a snack right on the beach. For those who wish to spend and live sports holidays, the Golf Beach offers a wide range of activities including windsurfing, tennis, mini golf, table tennis, gym, horse riding ... Possibility to play golf (27 holes) at about 10 km. For your conferences, seminars and meetings, the Golf Beach offers a large room for 250 people, and three subcommittee rooms.

title: Excellent
data: The Cesar Thalasso is an adults only hotel and bookable for guest from 16+. The hotel is located at the Plage de Sidi Mahrez beach on Djerba and is an favorite holiday destination. data: Inspired from the white djerbian Menzels, the hotel, is located on a plot of 11 hectares planted with olive and palm trees along the beautiful sandy beach of Djerba. The Manager assisted by his staff will give you a warm welcome Here everything is done to make you enjoy your stay in this comfortable hotel with its sandy beach, large outdoor freshwater swimming pool and heated indoor pool withan outdoor pool set in the patio. The Golf Beach has 237 fully air conditioned rooms. All rooms are equipped with bathroom (bath or shower), TV, telephone, safe, mini-bar, Wi-Fi and terrace with sea view (with extra charge), pool view or garden view according to their orientation. The Golf Beach also has 14 villas fully air-conditioned, each consisting of 3 bedrooms with bathroom, living room with a dining area, TV, Wi-Fi,a terrace and an equipped kitchen. Meals are served in the main restaurant OLIVERAIE, which opens onto the gardens and pool and declines as tasty and varied buffets for every gourmet delights, international and traditional cuisine. The hotel also offers two themed restaurants Le Pêcheur and La Felouque (Tunisian specialty) and a snack right on the beach. For those who wish to spend and live sports holidays, the Golf Beach offers a wide range of activities including windsurfing, tennis, mini golf, table tennis, gym, horse riding ... Possibility to play golf (27 holes) at about 10 km. For your conferences, seminars and meetings, the Golf Beach offers a large room for 250 people, and three subcommittee rooms.

data: Decorated in a traditional Djerbian style, the Seabel Aladin Djerba is a wonderful holiday destination both inside and out. title: Very good
data: Le Jerba Sun club est un hôtel entièrement rénové en complète harmonie avec son environnement. Il offre un mariage exceptionnel entre les commodités d’un hôtel moderne et une décoration d’inspiration berbère et djerbienne. Le complexe s’étend sur une superficie de 98,000 mètres carrés, un petit village pittoresque avec de beaux jardins fleuris et colorés de toutes les couleurs et des arbres magnifiques. Le club offre une vaste variété d’ activités sportives ainsi que celles pour la relaxation du corps et de l’esprit. 4 grands bâtiments de 385 chambres dont des chambres familiales, quadruples, communicantes et supérieures. Dans notre club, l’animation, quasi-permanente tout le long de la journée et pendant une grande partie de la nuit, est assurée par une grande équipe avec de nombreuses spécialités. title: Excellent
data: The deluxe Palm Beach Palace gives you direct access to a white beach, and is getting a 21st-century makeover for May 2015. title: Excellent
data: SENTIDO Djerba Beach is the perfect hotel for the whole family. This hotel has a very tranquil location with quiet surroundings, and is located directly on the sandy beach. For the more active family, the hotel organizes a wide range of activities, and there are two tennis courts at the hotel. Or why not discover the surroundings horseback, or rent a bike to discover the island of Djerba by yourself? In short, at SENTIDO Djerba Beach, there is something for the entire family.

title: Excellent
data:
The Iberostar Mehari Djerba hotel is undoubtedly the perfect landing point for guests who seek a special trip in one of the most magical places in Tunisia. Located on the seductive beach of Sidi Akkour, Djerba, is a hotel built in traditional Tunisian style where you can stay in double rooms or family rooms that have been refurbished to provide a cosier ambiance and some of the best services for rest and relaxation.
In the Monkey Club, children have a space to do all kinds of activities, games and sports that they will love and enjoy in the company of instructors and other playmates. Meanwhile, adults have a range of services including the body treatments and facilities of the SPA Sensations, the fitness room, free Wi-Fi, water sports, outdoor pools with a solarium, amazing shows, live music...And of course the flavours of the delicious Tunisian and international cuisine served at its two restaurants and four bars.
